name: Hunt the Wolf!
description:
Hunt the Wolf!

Fiveteen wolves has invaded the forest. Hunt them down with bow and arrow!

It is a literal take of the Trijam #168 theme of "Don't hurt nobody!" which in this game you need to fend off fiveteen wolves. This game was created mainly using pre-made assets from my past games.

Control:

WASD to move

Hold Left Click to shoot

Mouse position to aim

Bow will level up every three wolves hunted.

Assets used in this game:

Archer assets: reused from my past game, War in the Sky.

Tileset: reused and edited from my past game, Two Worlds.

Wolf assets: used Tiny, Tiny Heroes - Animals by Kacper Woźniak.

Other assets were created during the game jam.
